dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-vcstools
dependencies.description: VCS/SCM source control library for svn, git, hg, and bzr.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-rosdistro
dependencies.description: A tool to work with rosdistro files.

dependencies.name: py-catkin-pkg
dependencies.description: Library for retrieving information about catkin packages.

dependencies.name: py-wstool
dependencies.description:
A tool for managing a workspace of multiple heterogenous SCM
repositories.
